job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Our client, leading automotive supplier, is looking for machine learning engineer, to join their team in Berlin area. ResponsibilitiesDesign, code, experiment and implement models and algorithmsWork closely with researchers to take research developed ML models to productionBuild and improve existing data pipelinesImplement a cloud-enabled architectureContribute to and influence technology and product strategy and roadmaps Qualifications Degree in computer science or electrical engineering  3-5 years of experience in software development, applications and services Good knowledge of Python and DevOpsFluent German and English
